mbean:
Content Edit Service for dcm4chee-web3 org.dcm4chee.web.service.contentedit.ContentEditService The default constructor ContentEditService Root part of new generated UIDs. UIDRoot java.lang.String Concept Name Code used for Rejection Note Key Object Selection. RejectionNoteCode java.lang.String Enable/Disable sending Rejection Note. enableRejNote boolean Enable IOCM for propagation of changes for Study, Series and Instance level.
If enabled, changes are sent via RejectionNote and changed Instances instead of private Attribute Modification SOP class.
UseIOCM boolean Delay in milliseconds to send modified objects to IOCM archive.
This delay may assure that the rejection note is processed before the modified objects are sent.
(e.g. for move study to patient) IocmForwardDelay long ContributingEquipment used in Referenced Instance Sequence for IOCM. Format:<InstitutionName>|<StationName>|<Manufacturer> ContributingEquipment java.lang.String Enable/Disable sending Instance Availability Notification. enableIAN boolean Enable/Disable sending Instance Availability Notification after linking MPPS with MWL. sendIANonMppsLinked boolean Enable/Disable JMX notification of Archive services after linking MPPS with MWL.
Use ArchiveIANScuServicename.notifyOtherServices to send the notification.
Standard services which get notified: XDS-I, ExportManager, GPWLFeed and UPSFeed. NotifyArchiveServicesAfterLinking boolean List of AETs to forward modified objects to system that doesn't support Attribute Modification Notification. Use NONE to disable this feature. ForwardModifiedToAETs java.lang.String Enable forwarding of instances if patient attributes are modified.
If enabled, one instance (online) is sent to all AE's listed in ForwardModifiedToAETs
You should enable this feature only if you have to update a system that does NOT support HL7 ADT update messages! EnableForwardOnPatientUpdate boolean Identification of the system which modifies attributes. Used in OriginalAttributesSequence. ModifyingSystem java.lang.String Default Reason for attribute modifications. Used in OriginalAttributesSequence. ModifyReason java.lang.String Directory where configuration files for attribute coercion are located: if XSL stylesheet "mwl-cfindrsp2cstorerq.xsl" exists in this directory or in a sub-directory equal to the ScheduledStationAETitle, Serien and Study attributes will be updated with Request attributes from MWL item according these stylesheets. A relative path name is resolved relative to archive-install-directory/server/default/. CoerceConfigDirectory java.lang.String Set true if the mwl-cfindrsp2cstorerq.xsl stylesheet use the dcm4che14 xml format. Dcm14Stylesheet boolean Stylesheet to transform dcm4che2 formatted xml to dcm4che14 xml. Dcm2To14XSL java.lang.String Stylesheet to transform dcm4che14 formatted xml to dcm4che2 xml. Dcm14To2XSL java.lang.String Stylesheet to add MWL attributes to MPPS attributes for 'MPPS Linked' notification.
This allow the use of additional MWL attributes to create ORM message in HL7SendV2 service. A relative path name is resolved relative to archive-install-directory/server/default/.
NONE..leave MPPS attributes unchanged.
Use a leading '14|' identifier if the stylesheet is for dcm4che14 formatted xml. AddMwlAttrsToMppsXsl java.lang.String Enable update of MWL status after linking/unlinking MPPS to MWL.
If enabled the MWL status is set to COMPLETED after linking and SCHEDULED after unlink! UpdateMwlStatus boolean Used internally. Do NOT modify. QRServiceName javax.management.ObjectName Used internally. Do NOT modify. (only for internal use) unlinkMppsByPks MPPS primary keys mppsPks [J boolean Select or create patient for given patient attributes. selectPatient Patient Attributes patAttrs org.dcm4che2.data.DicomObject java.util.List Create a new Study. createStudy Study Attributes studyAttrs org.dcm4che2.data.DicomObject Patient primary key patPk long org.dcm4chee.archive.entity.Study Create a new Series. createSeries Series Attributes seriesAttrs org.dcm4che2.data.DicomObject Study primary key studyPk long org.dcm4chee.archive.entity.Series Remove foreign PPS Info from series of study given by studyPk.
